verses.text: \w The|strong="H3947"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, however, \w acted|strong="H4603"\w* \w unfaithfully|strong="H4604"\w* regarding \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w things|strong="H2764"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2764"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2764"\w*.\f + \fr 7:1 \ft Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering; also in verses 11, 12, 13, and 15.\f* \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w* \f + \fr 7:1 \ft Achan means troubler; also called Achar in 1 Chronicles 2:7.\f* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Carmi|strong="H3756"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w*,\f + \fr 7:1 \ft Zabdi is a variant of Zimri; also in verses 17 and 18; see LXX and 1 Chronicles 2:6.\f* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* what \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H3478"\w* \w apart|strong="H2764"\w*. \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* anger \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.

Meanwhile, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* men \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*, which \w is|strong="H7971"\w* \w near|strong="H5973"\w* \w Beth-aven|strong="H1007"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w of|strong="H6924"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* told \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w spy|strong="H7270"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* land.” \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* men \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w spied|strong="H7270"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5927"\w* \w returning|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w reported|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* need \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w send|strong="H5927"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; \w two|strong="H5221"\w* \w or|strong="H4592"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w enough|strong="H4592"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w attack|strong="H5221"\w* \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*. \w Since|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w few|strong="H4592"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* need \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w wear|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w about|strong="H4480"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7970"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w thirty-six|strong="H7970"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w chasing|strong="H7291"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* quarries \f + \fr 7:5 \ft Or as far as Shebarim\f* \w and|strong="H7970"\w* \w striking|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* slopes. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w melted|strong="H4549"\w* \w and|strong="H7970"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5307"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w tore|strong="H7167"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w clothes|strong="H8071"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w facedown|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* sprinkled \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.

“\w O|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*,” \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* said, “\w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w ever|strong="H2088"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w across|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Amorites \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* destroyed? \w If|strong="H3863"\w* \w only|strong="H3863"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3091"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w content|strong="H2974"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w other|strong="H2088"\w* \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*!

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*, \w now|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w its|strong="H2015"\w* \w back|strong="H6203"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* run \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w its|strong="H2015"\w* enemies?

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4100"\w* \w surround|strong="H5437"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* wipe \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth. \w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H4100"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*?”

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, “\w Stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*! \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*?

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*; \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* \w My|strong="H7760"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w what|strong="H1571"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2764"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2764"\w*. \w Indeed|strong="H1571"\w*, \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w stolen|strong="H1589"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w lied|strong="H3584"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w these|strong="H3947"\w* \w things|strong="H2764"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* own \w possessions|strong="H3627"\w*.

\w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w why|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w backs|strong="H6203"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* run \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w apart|strong="H2764"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w destruction|strong="H8045"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3254"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w unless|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w remove|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* whatever \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2764"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w destruction|strong="H8045"\w*.

\w Get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w consecrate|strong="H6942"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, saying, ‘\w Consecrate|strong="H6942"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H6942"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w there|strong="H5704"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w things|strong="H2764"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2764"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2764"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w remove|strong="H5493"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w you|strong="H7126"\w* must \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w selects|strong="H3920"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w forward|strong="H7126"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w selects|strong="H3920"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w forward|strong="H7126"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w selects|strong="H3920"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w forward|strong="H7126"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w caught|strong="H3920"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2764"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2764"\w* \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w*, \w along|strong="H5674"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w belongs|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* outrage \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.’” The Sin of Achan

\w So|strong="H7126"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w arose|strong="H7925"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* next \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w forward|strong="H7126"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w by|strong="H1242"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* selected.

\w He|strong="H3063"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w forward|strong="H7126"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w Zerahites|strong="H2227"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* selected. \w He|strong="H3063"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w Zerahites|strong="H2227"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w forward|strong="H7126"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* selected.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w forward|strong="H7126"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w by|strong="H1397"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Carmi|strong="H3756"\w*, \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w*, \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w was|strong="H1004"\w* selected.
